chapters.title: Chapter 27: The Practice of Diffdence
chapters.info: Lord Rodel Ituralde, p. 469 (333)—Commander of the royal army of Arad Doman. He is one of the best commanders in the world, in such company as Davram Bashere, Gareth Bryne, Agelmar Jagad, and Pedron Niall. However, he is mired deep in the civil war that is taking place in his home country at the moment.
